long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When searching on or using the Nairaland forum, we all know those users who spam the forum, posting the same thing repeatedly. This Chrome extension fixes that!


Update v1.2
Hide quoted posts
Persist hidden usernames on refresh
Show hidden usernames in popup
Unhide hidden posts if needed
Add styling

Update v1.1
Signatures hidden with text
Bug fixed hiding header along with posts
